textBox.richText: We’ve had a hat-trick of gloomy days as today proved to be our third rainy grey day in a row. Must have pissed off the weather gods with our complaining of the heat in Vegas!! Today we caught the subway over to Brooklyn and walked back to Manhattan over the Brooklyn Bridge. Although a bit wet it was great fun. After the stroll we dropped into South Street Seaport so Felicity could do some shopping. The poor girl had gone at least 3 hours without buying anything! Talk about an emergency situation! The day finished with a look around Union Square and a quick piccy of Flatiron. Tonight we’re indulging in a dose of culture as we are off to see a Broadway musical (Spamalot) at the Shubert Theatre.
